item.description:
Event Details: This is the first introductory class, in the series of (4) classes of training towards the Level of the First Degree towards Priest/ Priestess training.

Class Schedule is as follows:

Classes will be on Thursday evenings from 7:00-9:00 pm

Classes to begin:

Class l - Thursday, Sept 11th

The difference between Wicca & Witchcraft
Wiccan Glossary
Wiccan Beliefs
Wiccan Rede
3-Fold Law
Pentacle & Pentagram

Class 2 - Thursday, Sept 25th

The Wiccan Way
History of Paganism
The Burning Times
Salem Witch Trials

Class 3 - Thursday, October 9th

Important Pagan People
Witches Rede of Chivalry
Intro to the (8) Sabbats
The Esbats
The Elements
13 Goals of a Witch

Class 4 - Thursday, Oct 23rd

Principles of Pagan Belief
The Moon & Her Phases
The God & The Goddess
Pagan Ettiquette
Wiccan Traditions

Class 5 - Thursday, November 6th

Rites of Passage
Intro to Gardnerian Wicca
Covens & Degree Systems
Initiation
How to Meditate/ Group Exercise

Class 6 - Thursday, November 13th

Intro to Ritual
Book of Shadow/ Grimoires
Numerology/ How to find your Witch Name
How to find a "Healthy" Teacher/ Coven/ Group
Dedication

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There are (6) classes for each level which is
$15 per class; $90.00 per course, which includes
a CD that contains all paperwork to build your book of shadows.
Each level fills a 1 1/2 notebook binder, to be
provided by the student. Course costs are due
at Earth Spirits prior to the start of the class.
For more information you can call Earth Spirits at:
(508) 347-1180 or check out their website at:

www.earthspirits-herbals.com/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Each course builds upon the other.

To check out information on all of the classes, view pictures and testimonials of previous students, go to:

http://community-2.we....

Upon completion of all (4) Training levels, students can petition for continued no-cost private Training to the 2nd Degree Priest/ Priestess Level.

Please note: This will be the last Level One class until Fall 2010.
item.how_to_find_us: Come straight in the door, and we will be in the room straight ahead!
item.name: Witchcraft Training- Level 1
